医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
遗传特征如何导致南亚人早期糖尿病发病和代谢挑战该研究揭示了导致南亚人早期 2 型糖尿病的遗传因素，强调了胰岛素依赖和药物反应挑战的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/How-genic-traits-contribute-to-earlier-diabetes-onset-and-metabolic-challenges-in-South-Asians.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/How-genic-traits-contribute-to-earlier-diabetes-onset-and-metabolic-challenges-in-South-Asians.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdb24297-1fba-4181-ba13-d4284cc6879c Thu, 28 Nov 2024 11:06:00 -0500 How genetic traits contribute to earlier diabetes onset and metabolic challenges in South Asians
研究揭示激素治疗更年期症状的不同风险乌普萨拉大学的研究人员分析了七种不同的激素治疗更年期症状对血栓、中风和心脏病风险的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Study-reveals-varied-risks-of-hormone-treatments-for-menopausal-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Study-reveals-varied-risks-of-hormone-treatments-for-menopausal-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8683c63-4392-4af6-aec8-b79b60a27c36 Thu, 28 Nov 2024 11:02:11 -0500 Study reveals varied risks of hormone treatments for menopausal symptoms
研究揭示暂时性血流减少对高血压大鼠血管的影响阿拉巴马大学神经科学研究所 (INc-UAB) 和 CIBERCV 研究员 Francesc Jiménez-Altayó 博士协调进行的一项研究表明，大脑暂时缺乏血流可能会导致腹部小动脉发生持久变化在患有高血压的老鼠中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Study-reveals-effects-of-temporary-blood-flow-loss-on-blood-vessels-in-hypertential-rats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Study-reveals-effects-of-temporary-blood-flow-loss-on-blood-vessels-in-hypertential-rats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ecb3432-290b-466e-a8d2-77df81301498 Thu, 28 Nov 2024 10:08:00 -0500 Study reveals effects of temporary blood flow loss on blood vessels in hypertensive rats
专家探索GLP1疗法的扩展应用研究人员回顾了基于胰高血糖素样肽 1 的疗法的最新进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Expert-explores-the-expanding-applications-of-GLP1-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Expert-explores-the-expanding-applications-of-GLP1-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43898087-ccfa-416f-966b-dc607543637f Thu, 28 Nov 2024 10:08:00 -0500 Expert explores the expanding applications of GLP1 therapies
将人工智能安全融入临床环境的新指南麦克威廉姆斯学院教授 Dean Sittig 博士共同撰写的一篇文章指出，随着人工智能 (AI) 在医疗保健领域变得越来越普遍，组织和临床医生必须采取措施确保其在现实临床环境中的安全实施和使用UTHealth 休斯顿生物医学信息学博士和贝勒医学院教授 Hardeep Singh（医学博士、公共卫生硕士）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/New-guidelines-for-safely-integrating-ai-into-clinical-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/New-guidelines-for-safely-integrating-ai-into-clinical-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff775f86-524d-4fa1-90fc-7103d8d70e6a Thu, 28 Nov 2024 09:36:00 -0500 New guidelines for safely integrating ai into clinical settings
学前服务是弥合同种异体儿童语言差距的关键学习法语的同时培养母语的语言技能并不是一件容易的事。因此，异体儿童在幼儿园经常面临学习和沟通困难，这可能会对他们的教育旅程产生负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Preschool-services-key-to-bridging-language-gaps-for-allophone-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Preschool-services-key-to-bridging-language-gaps-for-allophone-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f752727f-98c2-4031-9a8b-92066e145943 Thu, 28 Nov 2024 09:29:00 -0500 Preschool services key to bridging language gaps for allophone kids
研究设计的缺陷可能会限制饮食试验中认知效应的检测研究人员回顾了饮食在预防认知能力下降和痴呆方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Flaws-in-study-design-may-limit-detection-of-cognitive-effects-in-diet-Trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Flaws-in-study-design-may-limit-detection-of-cognitive-effects-in-diet-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3aef3455-712d-4eec-8c45-33578802f38f Thu, 28 Nov 2024 08:49:00 -0500 Flaws in study design may limit detection of cognitive effects in diet trials
特定的 HRT 片剂会增加患心脏病和血栓的风险瑞典发表的一项研究发现，某些同时含有雌激素和孕激素的激素替代疗法（HRT）片剂与绝经期女性患心脏病和罕见但严重的血栓（称为静脉血栓栓塞（VTE））的风险较高有关。今天的英国医学杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Specific-HRT-tablets-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-disease-and-blood-clots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Specific-HRT-tablets-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-disease-and-blood-clots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=593be639-aca5-4e0b-b643-9225ef27ca55 Thu, 28 Nov 2024 00:11:26 -0500 Specific HRT tablets linked to increased risk of heart disease and blood clots
化石燃料行业影响医学研究，引发伦理担忧《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项调查揭示了化石燃料行业参与医学研究的程度，导致学术界和出版公司再次呼吁切断与公司的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Fossil-fuel-industry-influences-medical-research-raise-ethical-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Fossil-fuel-industry-influences-medical-research-raise-ethical-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4e92b52-9b74-4dc5-bce9-b90426581caa Thu, 28 Nov 2024 00:02:00 -0500 Fossil fuel industry influences medical research, raising ethical concerns
Obe-cel 在治疗白血病方面表现出强大的功效和安全性复发或难治性 CD19 阳性 B 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病 (ALL) 患者接受新型抗 CD19 嵌合抗原受体 (CAR) T 细胞疗法 obecabtagene autoleucel (obe-cel) 治疗后，缓解率很高，并且大多数患者根据德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心研究人员共同领导的 Ib/II 期 FELIX 试验的结果，不需要随后进行干细胞移植 (SCT)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Obe-cel-demonstrates-strong-efficacy-and-safety-in-treating-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Obe-cel-demonstrates-strong-efficacy-and-safety-in-treating-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d124aa8a-ed03-482f-9cd9-e0e32b23f0b9 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 23:42:20 -0500 Obe-cel demonstrates strong efficacy and safety in treating leukemia
